summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department and the Municipal Water Supply System; providing for the acquisition by condemnation of certain real property and property rights necessary for the TESS Pump Station Project in the east one-half of the southeast one-quarter of the northeast one-quarter of the northeast one-quarter of Section 10, Township 24 North, Range 5 East, W.M.; and in the southwest one-quarter of the Southwest one-quarter of Section 26, Township 25 North, Range 5 East, W.M., all in King County, Washington; as a part of certain additions and betterments to the existing municipal water system; and providing method of payment therefor.
